T01TD1140E:101a-1: sam myag sam buddh'a laksha na sto tram /
T01TD1140E:101a-3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa /
T01TD1140E:101a-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1140E:101a-5: lha dang lha min rnams kyis rgya cher mchod gyur cing //
T01TD1140E:101a-6: bcom ldan mdzes pa yid 'ong mtha' yas dang ldan pa'i //
T01TD1140E:101a-7: zas gtsang rigs rnams kyi ni rgyan gyi mchog gyur pa //
T01TD1140E:101a-8: gangs ri lta bur rgya cher mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1140E:101a-9: gang zhig khu byug bung ba sngon po lta bur 'jam gnag 'khyil cing mdzes pa'i dbu //
T01TD1140E:101a-10: gser gyi ri ngos tsam pa ka dang ldong ros lta bur dpral ba dri ma med //
T01TD1140E:101b-0: gangs dngul ku mu da dang @101b pad rtsa mu tig zla 'od las lhag mdzod spu dkar //
T01TD1140E:101b-1: gtso ma'i gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'phyang zhing rab tu mdzes pa'i snyan //
T01TD1140E:101b-2: aindra n'i la bung ba sprin gnag dang 'dra smin ma dri med 'jam //
T01TD1140E:101b-3: shangs kyi gzangs mtho rab mdzes smin ma rgyas pa lta bur mkhur tshos dmar //
T01TD1140E:101b-4: mchu ni bim pa gzhon bzhin 'gram pa seng ge dang 'dra kos ko'i dkyil 'khor mdzes //
T01TD1140E:101b-5: mnyam la thags bzangs tshems mnga' autpala rgyas pa'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring mnyen pa'i ljags //
T01TD1140E:101b-6: ngang pa khu byug ka la ping+ka lta bur zab cing yid du 'ong ba'i ngag / lha rnga mtshog dang 'brug dang tshangs dbyangs lta bur snyan cing dri ma med pa'i gsung //
T01TD1140E:101b-7: zlum rgyas mgul ni dung 'dra yangs shing rgyas pa'i thal gang mtho //
T01TD1140E:101b-8: gser sbyangs dang 'dra dri med gser gyi ri ngos mtshungs shing phrag gong dri ma med //
T01TD1140E:101b-9: sum cu rtsa gsum glang po'i sna 'dra btso ma'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i phyag / mdzes par 'khyil zhing bkra shis lcags kyu nya dang 'khor lo dag gis phyag mthil mtshan //
T01TD1140E:101b-10: bung ba'i lus dang khu byug mdog 'dra ba spu re re nas g-yas legs par 'khyil //
T01TD1140E:101b-11: gser gyi ri rtse pad+ma r'a ga myu gu 'thon pas khyab pa dang 'dra ba //
T01TD1140E:101b-12: mchog gi rab mchog pad+ma r'a ga lta bu dbus nas lte ba g-yas phyogs 'khyil //
T01TD1140E:101b-13: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs nub pus mo'i lta nga'i dkyil 'khor 'bar 'bur med cing mnyam //
T01TD1140E:101b-14: gser gyi chu shing 'dzam bu na de dang ni gser gyi ta la 'dra ba'i brla //
T01TD1140E:101b-15: legs skyes rim gyis pra zhing rab mdzes seng ge ri dags lta bur rje ngar zlum //
T01TD1140E:101b-16: ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra mnyam la dra bas 'brel zhing rab tu mdzes pa'i zhabs //
T01TD1140E:101b-17: dal zhing brtan la mi g-yo seng ge dang ni glang po'i stabs 'dra mdzes par gshegs //
T01TD1140E:101b-18: ngos dmar mtshams kyi nyi ma dmar bas khyab pa lta bur 'od zer rnam par 'phro //
T01TD1140E:101b-19: gser dang nor bu chu shel lta bur mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba'i sku //
T01TD1140E:101b-20: dri med nyi ma dbang po'i gzhu 'dra bcom ldan g-yas phyogs gshegs pa'i sku //
T01TD1140E:101b-21: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i zhabs brtan yang dag brtson 'grus mdzes pa'i snam logs can //
T01TD1140E:102a-1: ldan seng ge mchod byas lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas zhabs //
T01TD1140E:102a-2: bdud kyi bu mos zur mig blta bas gang zhig mi g-yo ting 'dzin ri ltar brtan //
T01TD1140E:102a-3: dpa' bo'i mtshon gyis mi bsnyil cod pan gyis gtugs dbang chen rnams la mgos phyag 'tshal ;
T01TD1140E:102a-4: / de ltar bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis mngon par bstod pa bgyis pa las //
T01TD1140E:102a-5: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags des ni 'gro kun sangs rgyas myur 'grub shog //
T01TD1140E:102a-6: / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa snyan dang gas mkhan chen po slob dpon ma ti tsi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
